name: lnrring

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, clnr), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clnm))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈ LNoeR, c0 ∈ Ring, (ringLMod ` c0)∈ LNoeM)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, clnr), wcel(c0, crg))
-| wb(wcel(c0, clnr), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clnm)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ LNoeR → c0 ∈ Ring)
⊣ (c0 ∈ LNoeR ↔(c0 ∈ Ring ∧(ringLMod ` c0)∈ LNoeM))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, clnr), wcel(c0, crg))
-| wb(wcel(c0, clnr), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clnm)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ LNoeR → c0 ∈ Ring)
⊣ (c0 ∈ LNoeR ↔(c0 ∈ Ring ∧(ringLMod ` c0)∈ LNoeM))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, clnr), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clnm)))

comment: Left-Noetherian rings are rings. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)
